Botticelli

Checklist for Station 2 in Capri Room

  1. Check white table cloth on top is clean. Change it or flip it if needed.
  2. All empty water jars should be on top facing side ways (so the wood doesnâ€™t get damage)
  3. Leave 2 sugar bowls of the same.
  4. Cutlery shelves: Both should be topped up but not overflowed.
  5. First shelf on your right hand side: Topped up with Napkins. Kids Menu on the left hand side.
  6. Second self on your right hand side: A third of Churchill plates piled up, a third of small side plates, side bowls.
  7. Bottom self on your left hand side: 3 rows of stands. Big black trays on top. Top up quilted dinner napkins on the left hand side.
